16421.en:
<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>It is rare to receive an order
directly from King Grossner himself.<stop_lip_animation n01437 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16421.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>「グロスナー王から
　直接　命令がくるなんて　めずらしいですね。<stop_lip_animation n01437 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16421.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>: 그로스너 전하께서
　직접 명령을 내리시다니 별일이군요.<stop_lip_animation n01437 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16421.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>古罗斯纳王直接下命令，
还真是罕见呢。<stop_lip_animation n01437 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16421.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>古羅斯納王直接下命令，
還真是罕見呢。<stop_lip_animation n01437 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16423.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Any time large sums of gold are involved it
makes the most sense to keep it out of the
public eye.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16423.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「しかも　大金が　からむとなると
　どう見ても　オモテの任務ではない。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16423.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 게다가 이런 큰돈이 오가다니
　아무리 봐도 평범한 임무가 아니야.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16423.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>而且这还关系到一大笔钱。
怎么看都不是什么正经任务。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16423.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>而且這還關係到一大筆錢。
怎麼看都不是什麼正經任務。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16424.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>However, King Grossners orders cannot be
ignored. Oh what am I to do?<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16424.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「とはいえ　グロスナー王の命令を
　ないがしろに　するわけにもいかんし……
　さて　どうしたものか。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16424.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 하지만 전하의 명령이니
　따르지 않을 수도 없고……
　이걸 어떡한다.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16424.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>话虽如此，也不能无视
古罗斯纳王的命令……
怎么办呢。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16424.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>話雖如此，也不能無視
古羅斯納王的命令……
怎麼辦呢。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16425.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Ah <pc>!
I hear you're shaping up to be quite the successful
Paladin. How wonderful! <stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16425.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あっ　<pc>！
　なんだか　いい感じの　パラディンに
　なっているのだ！　すごいのだ～！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16425.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 앗, <pc>!
　이제 제법 팔라딘 티가 나네!
　멋진걸~!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16425.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
你已经是非常不错的圣骑士了啊！
好厉害啊！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16425.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>！
你已經是個非常不錯的聖騎士了啊！
好厲害啊～！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16426.en: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Zubo, you have come to the right place!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16426.ja: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「ズーボー　いいところに来てくれた！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16426.ko: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 즈보, 마침 잘 왔다!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16426.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>兹博，你来得正好！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16426.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>茲博，你來得正好！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16427.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>I am sending <pc> on an
important mission, and I'd like you to
join them in this task.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16427.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「今　<pc>に　重要な任務を
　依頼したところなんだが……
　お前も　同じ任務に　当たってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16427.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 방금 <pc>에게 중요한 임무를
　맡긴 참이다만……
　네게도 같은 임무를 부탁하마.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16427.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>我刚想委托<pc>去执行
一份重要的任务……
你也一起吧。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16427.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>我正想委託<pc>去執行
一份重要的任務……
你也一起去吧。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16428.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>I am willing to accept any task that allows me
the opportunity to protect that which is
important to me!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16428.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「大切なものを守る仕事なら
　どんな任務でも　まかせてほしいのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16428.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 소중한 걸 지키는 일이라면
　어떤 임무든 맡겨 주십시오!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16428.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>如果是守护重要的东西，请尽管交给我吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16428.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>如果是守護重要的東西，
任何任務都請儘管交給我吧！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16429.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>I need you to go to the inn on Gert Strait to meet
a girl. A simple request, but there's more.
You must also escort her back here.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16429.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「ある少女を迎えるため
　ゲルト海峡の宿屋へ　行ってもらいたい。
　そして　ここからが　重要なんだが……<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16429.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 겔트 해협의 여관으로
　한 소녀를 데리러 가다오.
　그리고 여기서부터가 중요하다만……<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16429.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>我希望你们去凯尔特海峡的旅店，
接一位少女。
然后，接下来才是重点……<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16429.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>我希望你們去凱爾特海峽的旅店，
接一位少女。
然後，接下來才是重點……<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16430.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Speak with the squire at the inn and exhange
this box for the girl. This box is extremely important/nand must be handled with care.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16430.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「少女と引き換えに　この箱を
　必ず　従者に　渡してほしいんだ。
　この箱は　大事なものだ。絶対に　なくすなよ！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16430.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 소녀와 맞바꿔
　이 상자를 시종에게 건네주어라.
　중요한 상자이니 절대 잃어버려서는 안 된다!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16430.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>将这个箱子交给少女的随从，
用来交换那个少女。
这个箱子很重要，千万不要弄丢！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16430.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>將這個箱子交給少女的隨從，
用來交換那個少女。
這個箱子很重要，千萬不要弄丟！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16431.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>It's a bit heavy considering its size but
I accept it. I'll take good care of this.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16431.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「大きさの割に　重い箱なのだ……。
　わかりましたなのだ。
　必ず　忘れずに　渡しますなのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16431.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 크기는 작은데 묵직하네요…….
　알겠습니다.
　반드시 무사히 전달하겠습니다!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16431.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>箱子不大却很重呢……
我明白了。
我一定会交到对方手中的！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16431.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>箱子不大卻很重呢……
我明白了。
我一定會記得交到對方手中的！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16432.en: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Right then, I'm counting on you!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16432.ja: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「では　頼んだぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16432.ko: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 그럼 부탁하마!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16432.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>那么，拜托了！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16432.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>那麼，拜託了！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16433.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Then I'm off  to Gert Strait to retrieve the girl.
<pc>, I'll meet you there!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16433.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「じゃあ　オイラは　先に
　ゲルト海峡に行って　待っているのだ。
　<pc>も　後で来るのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16433.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 먼저 가서
　겔트 해협에서 기다릴게.
　<pc>도 나중에 와줘!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16433.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>那我先到
凯尔特海峡等着了。
<pc>也要来啊！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16433.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>那我先到
凱爾特海峽等著了。
<pc>晚點也要來喔！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16434.en: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc> did you just get here?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16434.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あっ　<pc>も
　今　来たところなのだ？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16434.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 아, <pc>도
　지금 온 거야?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16434.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>
也是刚刚到？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16434.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>啊，
<pc>也是剛到嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16435.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>The innkeepers sister has informed me that
she believes the girl we have come for is
indeed here. <stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16435.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「宿屋のお姉さんの話によると
　オイラたちが迎えにきた　女の子は
　ここに　いるらしいのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16435.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 여관 아가씨 말로는
　우리가 데리러 온 여자애가
　여기 있대.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16435.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>听旅店的姐姐说，
我们要接的少女
就在这里。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16435.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>聽旅店的小姐說，
我們要接的少女
好像就在這裡。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16436.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Pardon me! We have come at the request of the
Gartlant Paladins to fulfill an important task.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16436.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「失礼しますなのだ！
　ガートラント聖騎士団の依頼で
　お迎えにあがりましたなのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16436.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 실례하겠습니다!
　가트란트 성기사단의 의뢰로
　모시러 왔습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16436.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>打扰了！
我们受加特兰德圣骑士团的委托，
前来迎接少女。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16436.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>打擾了！
我們受加特蘭德聖騎士團的委託
前來迎接。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16437.en: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>Have you brought it with you...?<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16437.ja: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>「例のものは　あずかってきたかえ……？<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16437.ko: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>: 물건은 가지고 왔는가……?<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16437.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>那个东西带来了吗？<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16437.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>那個東西帶來了嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16438.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Oh right...
You must be referring to this box?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16438.ja: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「それって……　この箱のことなのだ？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16438.ko: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 물건이라면…… 이 상자 말입니까?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16438.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>那个是指……这个箱子？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16438.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>那個是指……這個箱子嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16439.en:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>Yippee... So you have brought it.
Great. Let's take a look inside.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16439.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>「イッヒッヒッ……。持ってきたようじゃな。
　では　中を　あらためさせてもらおう。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16439.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>: 이히히……. 잘 가져왔구먼.
　그럼 안을 확인해 보기로 하지.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16439.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻……看来拿来了呢。
那么让我检查下里面的东西吧。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16439.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻……看來是拿來了呢。
那麼讓我檢查一下裡面的東西吧。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16440.en: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Hmm. It seems to be filled with gold coins.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16440.ja: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「金貨が……　いっぱい入っているのだ……。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16440.ko: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 금화가…… 잔뜩 들어 있잖아……?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16440.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>装着好多……金币呢……<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16440.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>裝著好多……金幣呢……<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16441.en:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>Perfect, then we have a deal.
You may take the girl with you now.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16441.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>「交渉成立じゃな……。
　では　この子を　連れてゆくがいい。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16441.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>: 협상 성립이로군…….
　그럼 이 아이를 데려가게나.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16441.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>协议达成了……
那么，把这孩子带走吧。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16441.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>協定達成了……
那麼，把這孩子帶走吧。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16442.en: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>This is the promised child.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16442.ja: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>「この子が　約束の子じゃ……。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16442.ko: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>: 이 아이가 약속한 아이일세…….<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16442.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>这就是说好的那个孩子……<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16442.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>她就是說好的那個孩子……<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16443.en: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>Her name is Jenya.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16443.ja: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>「名前は　ジェニャ。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16443.ko: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>: 이름은 제냐.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16443.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>名字是杰尼娅。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16443.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>名字是潔妮亞。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16444.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Jenya? What is this promised child nonsense?
Why are we delivering so much gold in exchange
for her? What is the meaning of this?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16444.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「ジェニャ……？
　約束の子って　なんなのだ？
　さっきの金貨は……　なんなのだ？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16444.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 제냐……?
　약속한 아이라니 무슨 뜻이죠?
　그 금화는…… 대체 뭔가요?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16444.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>杰尼娅？
说好的那个孩子是什么意思？
刚才的金币……又是怎么回事？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16444.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>潔妮亞……？
說好的那個孩子是什麼意思？
剛才的金幣……又是怎麼回事？<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16445.en:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>Yippee. You're just a guard and should know
when to keep your mouth shut and not to pry.
Those details don't concern you.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16445.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>「イッヒッヒッ……。
　お前は　ただの護衛の者じゃろう。
　分をわきまえて　いらぬ詮索はするでない。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16445.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>: 이히히…….
　자네는 단순한 호위 아닌가.
　주제 넘는 호기심을 가지지 말게.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16445.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻……
你们只是护卫吧。
不要问多余的事情。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16445.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻……
你們只是護衛吧。
不要問多餘的事情。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16446.en: <start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>Now, if you'll excuse me. Yippee-hoo.<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16446.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>「では　わしは　失礼させていただこうかのう。
　イッヒッヒッ……。<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16446.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>: 그럼 난 이만 가 보겠네.
　이히히…….<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16446.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>那么，我就告辞了。
嘻嘻嘻……<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16446.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01433 _normal m00001>那麼，我就告辭了。
嘻嘻嘻……<stop_lip_animation n01433 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16447.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Fear not Jenya, we will protect you.
You need not worry about your safety from
here on.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16447.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「ジェニャ。オイラたちが　守ってやるのだ。
　そんなに　心配そうな顔は　しなくていいのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16447.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 제냐, 우리가 지켜 줄 테니까

16447.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>杰尼娅，我们会保护你的。

16447.zh-Hant:

16448.en:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>Uhh I'm fine...
I wasn't really worried about my safety before...
Umm well then...<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16448.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「あたしは　大丈夫。

16448.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>: 내는 괜찮다.

16448.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>我没有关系的。

16448.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>我不要緊。
不用擔心我。那個……<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Right. I am Zubo and this is my partner,

16450.en:

16456.en:

16458.zh-Hant:

16465.en:

16467.en:

16467.zh-Hans:

16467.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>歡迎來到加特蘭德城。
國王命令一定要
好好照顧潔妮亞小姐。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16468.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>From here on out, the Paladins of Gartlant
shall always ensure your safety here.
Please rest easy my lady.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16468.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「ここからは　我ら　王宮パラディンが
　誠心誠意　お守りさせていただきますゆえ……
　ごゆるりと　ご滞在くださいますように。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16468.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 앞으로는 저희 왕궁 팔라딘이
　온 힘을 다해 지켜드릴 테니……
　부디 편히 지내십시오.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16468.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>从现在起就由我们王宫圣骑士
诚心诚意地守护您……
请您尽情享受住在这里的时光吧。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16468.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>接下來就由我們王宮聖騎士
誠心誠意地守護您……
請您盡情享受住在這裡的時光吧。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16469.en:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>Well that's a relief!
I can finally relax a little.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16469.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「なんか　かたっ苦しいな～。
　もっと気楽にしてくれて　ええのに。<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16469.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>: 너무 딱딱한 거 아이가~
　좀 더 편하게 대해도 된다.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16469.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>怎么都那么一本正经的～
放轻松点多好。<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16469.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>怎麼都那麼一本正經的～
放輕鬆點多好。<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16470.en: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>Hello, it's nice to finally meet you, Jenya.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16470.ja: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「はじめましてっ　ジェニャさま。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16470.ko: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 안녕하세요, 제냐 님.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16470.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>初次见面，杰尼娅大人。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16470.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>初次見面，潔妮亞大人。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16471.en:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>I'm Pichon and I'll be your caretaker
during your stay here in Gartlant.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16471.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「私が　これから　しばらく
　ジェニャさまの身のまわりの　お世話を
　させていただく　ピチョンでございますっ。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16471.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 당분간 제냐 님의 시중을 들
　피촌이라고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16471.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>从今天起，就由我毕琼
暂时负责照顾
杰尼娅大人的生活起居。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16471.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>從今天起，就由我畢瓊
暫時負責照顧
潔妮亞大人的生活起居。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16472.en: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>Please, come on in.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16472.ja: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「さあっ　どうぞ　お部屋の方へ。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16472.ko: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>: 자, 방으로 모시겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16472.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>来，请随我去您的房间。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16472.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>來，請隨我去您的房間。<stop_lip_animation n01438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16473.en:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>Zubo, <pc>.
Thanks for bringing me here.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16473.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「ほななぁ～　ズーボーはん　<pc>はん！
　ここまで送ってくれて　ありがとうな。<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16473.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>: 담에 또 보제이~ 즈보 씨, <pc> 씨!
　여기까지 데려와 줘서 고맙데이.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16473.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>呐，兹博、<pc>！
谢谢你们把我送到这里。<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16473.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>再見～茲博、<pc>！
謝謝你們把我送到這裡。<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16474.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Yes, thank you for escorting Jenya to the
castle! Now, please receive your reward for
this service!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16474.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「ジェニャどのの護衛　ご苦労だった！
　さあ　任務の報酬を　受け取れ！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16474.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 제냐 님을 호위하느라 고생 많았다!
　자, 임무의 보상을 받도록!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16474.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>辛苦你们护送杰尼娅大人了！
收下任务的报酬吧！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16474.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>辛苦你們護送潔妮亞小姐了！
收下任務的報酬吧！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.en:
The quest "<%sev_quest_name>"
has transgressed with finesse!<update_quedate><open_irai>
42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

16475.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Jenya will be staying here at the castle for the
time being. Please remain vigilant as we may
need your help again before long.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16475.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「ジェニャどのは　当分の間　この城に滞在する。
　また　しばらくしたら　お前たちに
　協力を頼むことが　あるかもしれん。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16475.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 제냐 님은 당분간 이 성에서 지내실 거다.
　조만간 너희에게 또
　협력을 부탁할 일이 생길지도 모르겠군.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16475.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>杰尼娅大人暂时会留在这座城中。
或许过段时间，
还会委托你们帮忙的。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16475.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>潔妮亞小姐暫時會留在這座城中。
或許過段時間，
還會委託你們幫忙的。<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16476.en:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>With your talent I'm sure you'll be able to handle
any assignment we conjure up for you.
I'm looking forward to watching you grow!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16476.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「今の　お前たちなら 
　どんな任務が来ても　受けられるだろう。
　さらなる成長に　期待しているぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16476.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>: 하지만 지금의 너희라면
　어떤 임무든 맡을 수 있겠지.
　한층 더 성장하길 기대하마!<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16476.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>对于现在的你们来说，
不管什么样的任务，都可以胜任了吧。
我期待着进一步成长哦！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16476.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>對於現在的你們來說，
不管什麼樣的任務，都可以承接了吧。
期待你們能有更進一步的成長！<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16477.en:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Well then, <pc>.
I'm headed out. Until next time my friend!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16477.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「じゃあ　<pc>。
　オイラは　行くのだ。また会おうなのだ！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16477.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>: 그럼, <pc>.
　난 이만 갈게. 다음에 또 보자!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16477.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>那么，<pc>。
我走了。再见！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
16477.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>那麼，<pc>。
我走了。再見！<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>
